author: Heejung J
title: Not a hotel standard... definitely not 4 stars
text:
Not sure if everyone knew this hotel does not offer complementary water, no mini bar, no shower gown, no slippers and no bathroom amenities (they have shower gel attached to the bath tub wall.. and a soap, that's it) cause if I had known this would be the case, I would have not come here...
The location is convenient and the breakfast was okay, but the staffs were not very professional and some of them could not even speak English which I found very shocking.
Also this hotel does not have a bar... As a Accor platinum member I am supposed to get welcome drinks and since they don't have a bar I was asked to take one from the fridge that was located in the reception.. and they only had different types of water.. it was pretty hilarious.
In short, just not worth your money.. go somewhere nicer.
